title: Elfling
description: SHE MUST FIND HER FATHER… OR DIE.Alone on the streets of London, young Serapia Ravena seeks her father, her only hope of survival. When the elusive Duke suddenly returns to the city, Serapia finds a loving father, who quickly thwarts her uncle’s murderous plans. But it soon becomes clear that he hides a dark secret, one that threatens his very life, and his very soul. The search for his salvation will carry Serapia hundreds of leagues, to the heart of the wild places, and to the fort of the elfin, bringing her face to face with her own mysterious heritage.‘I was instantly drawn in’ - EOIN COLFER, author of ARTEMIS FOWL
author: Corinna Turner
